metadata.name: Crow's Nest (Animated Short-Film Clip)
metadata.description:
The owner of this NFT will acquire rights to the entire short-film: Crow's Nest (Kaaka Koode) 

Your name will be added at the end of the movie as 'NFT owned by'
Movie Link:
https://vimeo.com/346163825

Story plot:Journey of a little girl from Kerala, India, who has lost her roots after moving to a big city. She struggled initially to fit in but later became a part of globalization. Now she wonders if she can go back to her culture. This film throws a subtle question to the audience "Have you lost your roots? "

It has traveled to 13+ International Film Festivals across the Globe (including some of the famous ones)
-Seoul International Cartoon & Animation Festival
-Kuandu International Animation Festival
-Paris International Animation Film Festival
-Early Bird International Student Film Festival in Bulgaria

It was nominated in 
-IDSFFK, held at my hometown where the film was based on. I went with my grandmother to the premiere and showed her this movie, which was dedicated to her.
